thread.title: Global insurers take risks with cryptocurrency

title: Global insurers take risks with cryptocurrency
text:
Global insurers take risks with cryptocurrency 11:02am GMT - 01:37 
Major global insurers are starting to offer protection against cryptocurrency theft, willing to tackle the daunting challenges it brings rather than miss out on this volatile and loosely regulated, but rapidly growing business.   
Major global insurers are starting to offer protection against cryptocurrency theft, willing to tackle the daunting challenges it brings rather than miss out on this volatile and loosely regulated, but rapidly growing business.  //reut.rs/2nwqFGl
